page.title: 12Horse Trainer, Lound
page.content: Mr. Wright who lives in Lound trains horses for eventing. He has one field of 6 acres and l2 stables. At the moment he is training lO horses. He has 3 people working for him. They work long hours, getting up at 6 a.m. and sometimes not finishing until lO p.m. but they all enjoy the work very much. They are sometimes sad when the horses leave but they are pleased to get new ones. Mr. Wright buys the horses for about Â£3,OOO, trains them for 2 years and then sells them again. If he hopes to enter them for the Badminton Horse Trials, he keeps them for 4 years. The horses are sometimes taken abroad. The horses are between 3 and 4 years old when he buys them and they have not been broken in. They stand between l5.2 and l7.4 hands high. (Continued on Page l3)
